Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Click On Me
Board.description: Left-Click with the mouse on all the swimming fish before they leave the fishtank
Board.goal: Motor coordination: moving and clicking the mouse.
Board.manual: Use the left mouse button to click on the moving fish. A level 5 and after, a double click is mandatory.
Board.credit: Fish are taken from the Unix utility xfishtank. All image credits belong to Guillaume Rousse.
